name: Bomb The Heavens!
description:
Description:

Created in a weekend for Mini Jam 119

Blow up planets and collect resources!

How to play:

W to thrust forward

A/D rotate

spacebar to drop missiles

Red orbs give you energy, blue orbs give you points

Credits:

Code and (most of) the art - Erik Kirshey

Space Background - drakzlin

Pickup and Explosion Sound Effects - Little Robot Sound Factory

Music - Fupi

Thruster Sound Effect -  xhunterko
